Mexican president says his country is world's leading cultural powerMexican President Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador on Tuesday declared his country to be the foremost cultural power in the world, praising its ethnic and culinary diversity and international appeal. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 17:34:03 GMT IHTQJHLSWNPE5BSBBYBQC5WYE https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/mexican-president-says-his-country-is-worlds-leading-culture-power-2023-12-19/Reuters世界美洲
New US rule targeting real estate money laundering reaches White House reviewA long-awaited U.S. rule aimed at curbing money laundering in real estate has reached a key White House office for review, the final hurdle for it to clear before it can be formally proposed next year. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 16:58:10 GMT RE2DV5C2ZVJERGRFO53YDX7GEQ https://www.reuters.com/world/us/new-us-rule-targeting-real-estate-money-laundering-reaches-white-house-review-2023-12-19/Reuters世界美国
US adds 13 companies in China to unverified listThe United States has added 13 companies in China to its list of companies U.S. officials have been unable to inspect, according to a government notice posted on Tuesday. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 14:21:25 GMT GYSITP6OR5KONGED6UFQBP56PQ https://www.reuters.com/markets/us-adds-13-companies-china-unverified-list-2023-12-19/Reuters市场
Swiss bankers open to talks on some of measures demanded by country's regulatorThe Swiss Bankers Association (SBA) on Tuesday said it is open to discussions on a possible senior management regime for the country's lenders, one of the new measures demanded by Swiss regulator FINMA following the crash of Credit Suisse. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 13:35:41 GMT CID23DMJCFLK3MZ3UG2TBWBXMQ https://www.reuters.com/business/finance/swiss-bankers-open-talks-some-measures-demanded-by-countrys-regulator-2023-12-19/Reuters商业金融
Australia court finds Melbourne man guilty of foreign interferenceAn Australia court on Tuesday found a Melbourne man who held prominent positions in Chinese community associations guilty of planning an act of foreign interference, the first verdict of its kind under a law introduced in 2018. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 09:49:21 GMT KR45U76BLZNVLJDZSDQESLSEHY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/australia-court-finds-melbourne-man-guilty-foreign-interference-2023-12-19/Reuters世界亚太地区
The world's top 10 steelmakersJapan's Nippon Steel clinched a deal on Monday to buy U.S. Steel for $14.9 billion in cash. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 08:56:41 GMT 3QLKXYODFVKB5AKHUW6TN7FDAY https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/worlds-top-10-steelmakers-2023-12-19/Reuters市场商品
Investors dumped cash, bought stocks in December - BofAInvestors turned more bullish in December, buying stocks and reducing cash holdings on expectations the U.S. Federal Reserve has finished hiking rates and the global economy will avoid a big recession, a BofA fund manager survey showed on Tuesday. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 07:52:46 GMT FMAUFHJGDZP3DBD6BPAKY6EZ3U https://www.reuters.com/markets/investors-dumped-cash-bought-stocks-december-bofa-2023-12-19/Reuters市场
Not so sweet: India may need to import sugar as planting wanesIndia's sugar output this crop year, hit by weak rains, is set to lag consumption for the first time in seven years, according to traders and a survey of farmers, and lower plantings may even force the world's No.2 producer to import in the following year. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 06:39:44 GMT NPNV4EOAGFNXJAFMRLLDDEL3BI https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/not-so-sweet-india-may-need-import-sugar-planting-wanes-2023-12-19/Rajendra Jadhav市场商品
China Sinochem buys rare Venezuelan oil cargo after U.S. suspends sanctions -sourcesChina's Sinochem Corp has bought a million barrels of Venezuelan crude oil for arrival in December, a rare purchase as the state oil and chemicals group capitalises on Washington's suspension of sanctions on the South American producer. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 05:21:05 GMT A32ZKVSZOZONZBWMUNAAM7DEXQ https://www.reuters.com/business/energy/china-sinochem-buys-rare-venezuelan-oil-cargo-after-us-suspends-sanctions-2023-12-19/Chen Aizhu, Florence Tan商业活力
Diplomatic pressure builds over Hong Kong democrat Jimmy Lai's security trialInternational pressure was building over a landmark national security trial in Hong Kong for leading China critic Jimmy Lai, with British authorities calling for consular access to the jailed democrat as his trial entered its second day on Tuesday. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 04:57:46 GMT XR6MQUPIUNJNCTLOUAFEPENUM https://www.reuters.com/world/china/diplomatic-Pressure-builds-over-hong-kong-democrat-jimmy-lais-security-Trial-2023-12-19/James Pomfret, Jessie Pang世界中国
Setting aside tensions, Taiwan president offers aid to China after deadly quakeTaiwan President Tsai Ing-wen expressed condolences to China on Tuesday and offered her government's help after an earthquake killed more than 100 people on the northern edge of the Qinghai-Tibetan plateau. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 03:55:02 GMT RRN4WP4YXRMMRLLTLCGAWNKL5I https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/setting-aside-tensions-taiwan-president-offers-aid-china-after-deadly-quake-2023-12-19/Reuters世界亚太地区
